messages.subject: disagreements
messages.messageBody:
<I am not afraid of disagreements, or anyone expressing their opinion, but
when it starts to be accompanied by things like"I'm not going to deny my
religion for any one", which sounds defensive, or fails to aknowledge that
this is just one person's belief or opinion, which is offensive it often
leads to nastiness.

candice>


Unforunately that is so true. People take things very personally sometimes.



~Nicoletta
*********************************************************
"It is paradoxical, yet true: Children are the most in
need of loving attention when they act the least
deserving of it!"
by Aletha Solter, 1998
from the article "Why Children Misbehave"
www.awareparenting.com
*********************************************************
